title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When a file is already open in the editor and the user tries to open the same file with a different type of editor using the 'Open With...' menu option, nothing happens.
EB: When a file is already open in the editor and the user tries to open the same file with a different type of editor using the 'Open With...' menu option, a new editor instance should be opened for the file with the selected editor type.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'
3. With the 'test.xml' file selected in the Navigator, choose 'Open With...'
4. Select 'Default Text Editor' from the options
5. Verify that no new editor instance is opened for the file

EXPECTED BEHAVIOR:
A new editor instance should be opened for the file with the selected editor type.
